review: Logs out, then has no way to login with a password. Forces to login with email and then never sends any email. It is impossible to login and use this app.

new app update is the worst! Changed the payment option & now you pay before you get there. The app will choose drive thru when I get close to the restaurant even though I am going inside. Employees can not take drive thru codes inside "apparently". There's now no option to change pick up anymore. You have to cancel, all promotions and/or points are refunded within a couple of days and the promotion is unavail which means you can no longer repeat and place the same order. App crashes.

App won't let me order because it says I have a pending order.. from a delivery THREE days ago. How long before it clears the app? This needs an update soon to remove this barrier. I should be able to order over and over if I want to.
